member.name: P:Microsoft.Exchange.Data.Transport.Smtp.SmtpSession.LastExternalIPAddress
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, the property gets or sets the Internet Protocol (IP) of the last mail server to process the message before the message entered the organization.
member.returns: When overridden in a derived class, the property returns an instance of the IPAddress class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Exchange.Data.Transport.Smtp.SmtpSession.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, the property gets or sets the Internet Protocol (IP) end point for the local connection.
member.returns: When overridden in a derived class, the property returns an instance of the IPEndPoint class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Exchange.Data.Transport.Smtp.SmtpSession.Properties
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, the property gets or sets an indexer for custom session properties.
member.returns: When overridden in a derived class, the property returns a dictionary object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Exchange.Data.Transport.Smtp.SmtpSession.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, the property gets or sets the Internet Protocol (IP) end point for the remote connection.
member.returns: When overridden in a derived class, the property returns an instance of the IPEndPoint class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Exchange.Data.Transport.Smtp.SmtpSession.SessionId
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, the property gets or sets the ID for the session.
member.returns: When overridden in a derived class, the property returns a Guid value.
